title: Californian
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Californian**

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300im_/http:/www.fontbureau.com/media/images/specimen/splash/californianfb.gif)

Considered of one his finest type designs, [Frederic W. Goudy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/frederic_w_goudy) designed Californian as a private commission for the University of California at Berkeley in [1939](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/1939). Californian was later released by [Lanston Monotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lanston%20Monotype) for general use by designers and printers.

**Discussion:**  
 [LTC Californian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/typophile.com/node/19766)  
 [Californain FB vs. Berkeley Oldstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/typophile.com/node/3077)  
 [Question about Californian FB](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/typophile.com/node/8061)  
 [Sans Pairing for Californian?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/typophile.com/node/4940)

**Versions:**  
 [LTC Californian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/Californian.html)  
 [Californian FB](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/CalifornianFB)  
 [ITC Berkeley Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026184300/http:/www.itcfonts.com/fonts/font/pid/201672/ITC+Berkeley+Old+Style+Medium/detail&grab_id=0&page_id=25687&query=berkeley&SCOPE=ITCFonts)
author: paul d hunt
